about_the_game:
Spooky Survivors is a fast-paced roguelite that combines humor, strategy, and supernatural chaos. Play as Van Hobo, an eccentric monster hunter with a knack for survival, as you battle relentless hordes of ghastly foes in a haunted realm.

Features:

  • All Unlocks from the Start: Begin with every upgrade at your fingertips, but the power is in your choices—level up strategically to adapt to the chaos.

  • Equip Powerful Gear: Find and equip unique items to boost stats and gain abilities, creating endless build possibilities.

  • Dynamic Challenges: Face evolving waves of enemies that test your strategy and reflexes.

  • Procedural Variety: No two runs are the same, with randomized gear, enemies, and levels keeping the challenge fresh.

  • Quirky Humor: Embrace the light-hearted charm of Van Hobo as you flip the script on traditional monster hunting.

  • Chase Glory: Push yourself run after run, wave after wave, and fight to secure your spot in the top 100 leaderboard!

Survive the night, outsmart the hordes, and prove that even a hobo can be a legendary hero in this supernatural bullet hell adventure!

short_description: Spooky Survivors puts you in the shoes of Van Hobo, a quirky hero battling the supernatural! Start with all unlocks BUT choose which to level up as you face endless waves. Equip powerful gear and unlock unique abilities. Outlast the nightmare and prove yourself as the ultimate spooky survivor!
